title: App Development Practical Skills Enhancement: Service-Learning-Based Pharmacy Education Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic pharmaceutical theory (pharmacology, pharmacokinetics) and instructional methodologies
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can establish three or more educational objectives for a community-based medication education program through service-learning design.
Learners can plan and execute service-learning-based pharmaceutical education activities in online environments at least twice.
Learners can improve cultural competence and professional communication skills by 15% or more through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
